content.rendered: The Barangaroo site, a highly polluted former industrial area, calls for innovative methods to meet its many technical and environmental challenges. After completing the foundations for high-rise buildings anchored at a depth of more than 25 metres and building the peripheral wall, the Soletanche Bachy major projects division joined Menard and AFS Bachy Soletanche to win two further contracts in 2016 to build the retaining walls for a soil remediation and construction project.

excerpt.rendered: West of the port of Sydney, Soletanche Bachy and Menard are helping to convert the Barangaroo industrial area into a mixed-use residential and retail complex in a huge project covering 22 hectares.
